name: github-radar
description: GitHub Open Source Radar - Discover trending, fastest-growing, and newly published repositories

scripts.daily: npm run build && node dist/index.js daily
scripts.analyze-top: npm run build && node dist/index.js analyze-top
scripts.analyze-missing: npm run build && node dist/index.js analyze-missing
scripts.analyze-missing:preview: npm run build && node dist/index.js analyze-missing --dry-run --limit 10
scripts.analyze-missing:small: npm run build && node dist/index.js analyze-missing --limit 5 --delay 5000
scripts.analyze-missing:medium: npm run build && node dist/index.js analyze-missing --limit 20 --delay 3000
scripts.analyze-missing:stats: npm run build && node dist/index.js analyze-missing --dry-run --limit 1
scripts.publish-wechat: npm run build && node dist/index.js publish-wechat
scripts.publish-latest: npm run build && node dist/index.js publish-wechat --latest
scripts.list-analyses: npm run build && node dist/index.js publish-wechat --list
